ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Plane of Knowledge NPC's
ygData.msgSnippet: It s possible that you do not have good enough PoK faction for these NPCs to continue and actually offer you a quest. A possible solution is the sewing
ygData.messageBody:
It's possible that you do not have good enough PoK faction for these NPCs to
continue and actually offer you a quest. A possible solution is the "sewing
needles for Willamina" quest. Talk to Willamina (loc neg 415, pos 1160), and
she sends you off on a Fed Ex quest involving 9 other NPCs, all in PoK.

You finally get a book from her that, in addition to some minor stats, also
contains something called a "faction modifier", which I am assuming modifies
PoK faction to the point that others will give you quests, i.e. continue
their conversations further.

I have written down the names and locs of all the NPCs, if you want them.

Froondor


----- Original Message -----
From: <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 19, 2002 1:22 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Plane of Knowledge NPC's


> I have been exploring the pok for my last two sessions. Had a bit of
> a break between sessions due to having no power for most of a week.
> Quite a storm here in the Central Coast district of California.
>
> In talking with many NPC's I found them giving me about a paragraph
> of monologue, breaking at a point which indicates more to come.
> However, few have the "continue" command attached. Anyone know how to
> get the whole monologue from these NPC's?
>
> I tried increasing the size of my dialogue box, but had no success.
> Now I did have two boxes open, side by side, and only tried adding
> length to the box in which the NPC's were talking. I may try a wider,
> longer box next time. Anyone have any experience in pok with this
> problem?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
